_header: In my conscience I find / And in my soul I hear & see
_description: God’s Appeal to Man — fourteen 8-line stanzas

BodDig102.First Lines:
[I]n my conscience I fyndeAnd in my soule I here &
                    see…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…Ouercome my wraþþe & fle fro vysAnd do þe
                    comaundementis þat y bede
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 85-9.
